## Color3.clampToRef() method

Clamps the rgb values by the min and max values and stores the result into "result"

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clampToRef(min: number | undefined, max: number | undefined, result: Color3): Color3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  min | <code>number &#124; undefined</code> | defines minimum clamping value (default is 0) |
|  max | <code>number &#124; undefined</code> | defines maximum clamping value (default is 1) |
|  result | <code>Color3</code> | defines color to store the result into |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Color3`

the original Color3
